programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5264
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Someday Or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: After legendary kung fu star Jackie Chan adopts the panda Hu Hu, an international crime syndicate places a massive bounty on the bear. Joined by his agent and Hu Hu's caretaker, Jackie embarks on a daring quest to outsmart the villains.

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong's legendary detective?

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, a white woman is murdered in Chinatown, and a Chinese man becomes the prime suspect. The crime sparks public outcry to shut down the district. Amid growing unrest, two Chinese detectives, Qin Fu and Ah Gui, race against time to uncover the true killer before prejudice and danger consume their community.

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a bank's top executive's use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the bank's chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Oversteer
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story, the film follows Feng, a determined young man who defies his father to pursue his dream of becoming an automotive mechanic. Alongside his childhood friend Yun, he embarks on a daring journey that unexpectedly plunges them into the exhilarating world of racing, sparking a passionate coming-of-age adventure.

programme.title: Sky on Fire
programme.desc: The chief security officer at a top-secret medical facility finds himself caught in an explosive battle when a young thief steals a groundbreaking medicine. After discovering the true origins of the medicine however, the officer must decide who he can trust to protect the cure from falling into the wrong hands and prevent an all-out war.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the government's $15 billion 'Care Fund'. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora. After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong. Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Go for Broke
programme.desc: A ruthless drug trafficking group has destroyed countless families due to drug addiction, including Zhang Yao's family. Vowing to take revenge, Zhang Yao teams up with Detective An to take down the drug lords. As their revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: Little Red Sweet
programme.desc: A Chinese dessert shop owned by the Chang family in Kowloon City faces upheaval when the mother suffers a devastating stroke. Their daughter sacrifices her dream of becoming a flight attendant to help keep the family business alive, but tensions rise as she clashes with her father. Can they find a way to overcome their struggles and remain united?

programme.title: Dust To Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the home's wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Man On The Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the club's top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill's nieces!

programme.title: Journey of the Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: Yang Guo and Xiao Long Nu are deeply in love and live harmoniously in the ancient tomb. Xiao Long Nu proposes marriage one day but Yang Guo declines. Heartbroken, she leaves without a word. Devastated by her absence, Yang Guo searches tirelessly for her. When they finally reunite, he begs her to marry himonly for her to refuse his proposal.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern - an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards' heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen's brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen's home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers' claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wong's disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Bloody Parrot
programme.desc: A swordsman is suspected of being the thief of a treasure sent to Emperor. Through his investigation, he is led on to the trail of the supernatural Bloody Parrot. Poisonous things happen including a demonic possession, witches casting poison spells and disgusting autopsies. Then a dead constable turns into a vampire!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang's fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men's help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his father's martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hung's passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lu's disciple.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep126
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Paap O Meter S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: The Heart of the Jungle - Sandokan decides to free Marianne and journeys to Sarawak to find his real parents. Sandokan and Marianne are captured by a rogue Dayak tribe, which happens to be Sani's. Yanez and crew are also caught while tracking Sandokan. Forced to fight a cobra to prove his Dayak heritage, Sandokan is poisoned but survives, gaining the tribe's acceptance. Meanwhile, Brooke and Murray defy orders and follow Sandokan's trail.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince S1 Ep6
programme.desc: In the Dark - Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe's chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang's jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak's struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne's father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Death of a Pirate - Sandokan helps fight off a raid by the Sultan's men, but is captured when Lang betrays him. Marianne, back in civilized life and courted by Brooke, struggles with doubts about what Sandokan told her, breaking down as the Sultan parades the tortured pirate in Labuan and she realises her father's guilt as a war criminal. Meanwhile, the Sultan exposes Brooke's biracial identity, disgracing him. Determined to redeem himself, Brooke proposes a mysterious plan to Marianne. Soon after, Sandokan is found dead in his cell.

programme.title: Killer Couples S15 Ep8
programme.desc: Kristl Koslow and Brian Salter - When a wealthy couple falls victim to a deadly home invasion, the search for the killers exposes both a twisted relationship and a family betrayal no one saw coming.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep5
programme.desc: Going Under - When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that's a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris's erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious. Meanwhile -after learning Duncan has made serious professional allegations against her -Andy decides to help Sam with a missing person's case that takes a dark turn.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Family Man - The SWAT team faces off with a family of doomsday preppers barricaded inside their fortress of a home, and Deacon finds himself at the center of the storm. Also, Tan clashes with a reporter covering the situation and Powell grapples with meeting the child she gave up for adoption 18 years ago.

programme.title: ELSBETH S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot - A theater student is found dead in her apartment, Elsbeth suspects foul play and enters a game of wits against the victim's theater director. Elsbeth must balance her role with the NYPD and her methods to make her case and uncover the killer.

programme.title: BLUE BLOODS S14 Ep14
programme.desc: New York Minute - Danny and Baez scrutinize an art gallery suspected of selling counterfeit pieces after a detective investigating the establishment is murdered. Also, Eddie is conflicted when she discovers her former partner turned social worker, Rachel Witten (Lauren Patten), crossed the line to get a mentally ill client much needed help, and Frank is upset when an award Danny was to be honored with is rescinded by Grace Edwards (Lori Loughlin), the widow of an NYPD officer killed in the line of duty.

programme.desc: A Classic New York Character - After the loathed co-op board president of a luxury pre-war building falls off her balcony to her death, Elsbeth and Kaya are called to the scene to dig for a lead.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rites Of Passage - As the Silver family observes Yahrzeit to honor patriarch Ben Silver on the one-year anniversary of his death, Lena and Danny investigate the murder of a beloved shop owner. Meanwhile, Sarah responds to a hostage crisis and Mae faces a difficult legal decision.

programme.title: FBI: MOST WANTED S6 Ep21
programme.desc: Souls on ICE - After three men impersonating ICE officers raid a church in New Jersey, the Fugitive Task Force must earn the trust of the reverend to help find the men who were kidnapped.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep6
programme.desc: Two Truths and a Lie - As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy -Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary. All are known associates of the prime suspect, and one person on that list happens to be none other than Jay Swarek, Sam's elusive father.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S7 Ep9
programme.desc: Honeytrap - When a female robbery crew honeytraps and kills several rich VIPs, HONDO and 20-SQUAD are called in to assist FBI Agent Jackie Vasquez in capturing the dangerous fugitives before the death toll rises. Commander Hicks is shocked when his new love, Maggie, abruptly ends their relationship without rhyme or reason. With help from Deacon and Dr. Wendy, Hicks makes an important decision about his romantic future.

But when Duncan produces new evidence that shifts all the blame to Andy, Oliver must decide if he's willing to compromise his professional integrity -and his friendship with Andy -to save her career.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S7 Ep10
programme.desc: Snafu - As 20-Squad scrambles to track down a cold-blooded sniper terrorizing Los Angeles, Hondo discovers a link to his own South L.A. neighborhood that brings a personal twist to the hunt for the deadly shooter. Meanwhile, Tan finds himself questioning his leadership abilities while Powell and Alfaro compete in a classic game of SWAT tag.

programme.title: CORONER S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Crispr Sistr - Jenny and Donovan investigate the death of a lab assistant - but Jenny's personal interest in the lab risks clouding the case for her.

programme.title: ELSBETH S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Love Knocked Off - Things turn deadly when elite matchmaker Margo Clarke goes to extreme lengths to keep her socialite client from finding out the truth about her perfect new husband.

programme.title: ROOKIE, THE S8 Ep3
programme.desc: The Red Place - John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL S3 Ep1
programme.desc: June - The Fly Team, with the help of their new intel analyst, Special Agent Amanda Tate (new series regular Christina Wolfe), works to clean up the pieces left behind after a massive explosion rocks headquarters and their key suspect slips away.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Exit Strategy - Chris's addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation. As the victims' secrets come out, the full extent of the family's dysfunction sends their teenage son to a place of despair -but it's Chris and Dov who end up in a struggle for their lives.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S7 Ep11
programme.desc: Whispers - Tan finds himself on a one-man mission to save his new love interest and her journalist co-workers when mercenaries take over a black-tie correspondents' dinner. After the group escapes, it's up to SWAT to track down the well-trained gunmen before anyone else is killed. Meanwhile, Hondo and Nichelle return home to find their house trashed, placing them at odds when it's revealed that Nichelle has a secret. And when Hicks, Mumford and Buck take a trip down memory lane, it threatens to end their decades-long friendships.

programme.title: DOC S1 Ep3
programme.desc: New Blood - A patient forces Amy to confront the realities of medical tourism, TJ helps a veteran with his prosthetic and Joan drops a bombshell.

programme.title: LONG BRIGHT RIVER S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mother Wolf - Mickey puts herself in danger while following up on the Dock lead. Mickey brings Thomas and Truman to her family's Thanksgiving and Paula's reaction to a new piece of evidence makes Mickey question everything.

programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S2 Ep1

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep1

programme.desc: Keri Russell - Actress Keri Russell joins Bear on an epic journey to the Canary Islands off the coast of Africa. After battling the dangerous, rolling rocks of a massive volcano, the duo descend into a canyon.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: World's Most Amazing Walks with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Austria - Robson Green is in Austria hiking along the stunning Wachau Valley, following the incredible blue Danube.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Volcano - Volcan del Fuego in Guatemala is one of the most 'explosive' volcanoes of them all. To reveal what's happening within the volcano, witness the daring attempt to lower a data gathering probe inside.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Insect Apocalypse - Look at what a global insect decline could do to our planet. Uncover our historical dependence on these tiny animals, the vital roles they play in our ecosystems, and the reasons why our fragile relationship to them is in danger worldwide.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it's wildlife.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati's territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal's move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Summer Cubs - Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.title: Becoming Elephant: the Orphans of Reteti S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Back to the Wild - Balance the pain of goodbyes with hope for the future as a generation of rescued elephants are finally released. Welcome new additions to the Reteti family, including a baby elephant rescued from a watering hole and a traumatized zebra named Kisima.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi - Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard who's been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it's wildlife.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Fortresses - In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Spring on New Zealand's east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. They've returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Experience unbelievable acts of courage and loyalty by creatures trying to survive in the remote wilderness of New Zealand's South Island. Face forest penguins' feast and famine cycles, and explore the tumultuous world of newborn sea lions.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep5

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Manzi the Superpack - Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep3

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher's pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - Learn how winter's arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Eat Or Be Eaten - Go up against predatory insects that are tailor-made for killing. See why the terrifying praying mantis has the agility of a martial artist and an appetite for everything from flies to hummingbirds, then go hunting in mid-air with deadly dragonflies.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Reid's Palace, Madeira - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit Reid's Palace on Madeira. Giles irons bedspreads in a suite once loved by Winston Churchill, and Monica cleans crabs out of the historic tidal swimming pool.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Electrical Substation Tower, Cornwall - In Cornwall, George meets Abi and Morveth, who've sunk their life savings into a disused electrical substation. Can they turn this neglected shell into their home?

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S5 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 7 - It's Biscuit Day and the Heat B bakers are asked to create a 'biscuit picture of your best day ever' to show off their skills.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Paul attends a quinceaera birthday party in Baja California, tries fresh cactus in Milpa Alta and insects in Oaxaca, and visits one of Mexico's best restaurants on the Yucatn Peninsula.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Reid's Palace, Madeira - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit Reid's Palace on Madeira. Giles irons bedspreads in a suite once loved by Winston Churchill, and Monica cleans crabs out of the historic tidal swimming pool.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Bethan and John's Railway Carriage - Simon is in Shropshire to help vintage vehicle-loving Bethan and John turn a 1940s railway goods carriage into a unique B&B located in their back garden.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Michele and Tobin's Summerhouse - Simon and his team are in Devon to help create a unique B&B that's not just for people. After achieving their dream of buying a small holding and stables, Michele and Tobin realised that the tired summerhouse on the property could offer lodgings.

programme.title: Mary Berry Makes It Easy S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Starting from Scratch - Mary meets Anton Du Beke in sunny Bournemouth to teach him simple recipes, perfect for a total beginner, squeezing in time for a waltz along the pier and trip on the Ferris wheel.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Reid's Palace, Madeira - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit Reid's Palace on Madeira. Giles irons bedspreads in a suite once loved by Winston Churchill, and Monica cleans crabs out of the historic tidal swimming pool.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 8 - On a visit to a dairy, Rick meets a man who is paid to eat 700 samples of cheese a week and cooks his sumptuous cheese and chive scones. His next stop is the salty old fishing town of Newlyn, the unlikely setting of one of Britain's most revolutionary art movements. Rick discovers an intriguing tale of deception behind one of the most famous paintings produced here.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep4
programme.desc: France - Inspired by Marseille's mouthwatering seafood and Provence's flavoursome fare, Jamie cooks steak and chips with a Marseille-style twist and a courgette, goat's cheese and olive tapenade tart.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Isolated Retreats - Explore a rocky retreat in the mountains of South Africa. Relax at a luxury bolthole in the Welsh countryside and check in to a forest treehouse near Australia's Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Grand Designs S23 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 23, Episode 4 - Kevin revisits Graeme and Melanie, whose hugely ambitious Hackney haven was hampered by a basement bombshell. Have they finally got out of the red and into their modernist home?

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Citrus Week - Our amateur bakers compete to show us a tangy tropical side to baking for Citrus Week, taking on Individual Citrus Tarts, a Gin and Tonic Roulade and a Citrus Meringue creation.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep4
programme.desc: France - Inspired by Marseille's mouthwatering seafood and Provence's flavoursome fare, Jamie cooks steak and chips with a Marseille-style twist and a courgette, goat's cheese and olive tapenade tart.

programme.desc: Simple Suppers - Jeremy heads to Wales to meet Kyle and learns about pig farming before making Lemongrass Pork Chops, a dish he picked up in Vietnamese markets.

programme.title: Jeremy Pang's Asian Kitchen S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Restaurant Classics - Jeremy is in Kent exploring Kate's duck farm to find out what makes her ducks special.

programme.title: Fading Flavors S1 Ep9
programme.desc: In the past, fishermen in Hong Kong's coastal areas, such as Ma Wan and Lamma Island, used to make shrimp paste, but now only Tai O still has a shrimp paste factory.

programme.title: Fading Flavors S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hing Fat Hong has been working in Seafood Street for decades, witnessing the rise and fall of the street from retailing to wholesaling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Wheres The Party? , The Noisiest Night - When Marcus loses an invitation to a birthday party and doesn't know where it will take place, the Dew Drops set out to find the location and get Marcus to the party on time. / When Harper can't sleep because of a strange noise in her room, the Dews must figure out the source.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Escape The Backpack , Play Date - While helping Lola pack for her first day of camp, the Dews get stuck inside her backpack! Using the random items inside, the Dews get crafty in their attempt to break out. / When Eden and Phoebe join Harper and Marcus for a playdate, the Dews disagree on what activity their kids should do, ultimately learning that there are lots of ways to play!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia , Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep75
programme.desc: Darkest Night - When Stoick is shot down Hiccup and the riders race back to Berk to help

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep76

Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep39
programme.desc: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast? - It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, What shall we have for our harvest breakfast? That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. What about something chewy suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry - until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep40
programme.desc: What Hat Should Mimi Wear? - Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear - the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep41
programme.desc: What's Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep42
programme.desc: It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep43
programme.desc: What's The Funny Little Creature In The Pond? - Jess is looking after Horace's underwater friends in the pond whilst Horace is away. He sees a funny creature with a round head, a long tail and a little mark on his nose. What's the funny little creature in the pond? Hey! That's the Big Question! The creature has vanished so Jess describes it to Mimi who draws a picture of it. Mimi, Joey and Jinx think it must be a fish and name him Freddie, but Jess is not so sure. Time passes and Jess doesn't see Freddie again for ages. When he does spot him he's grown two back legs! Jess decides he needs a closer look using Billie's magnifying glass. They search for Freddie all round the pond. Baa thinks he's found him, but it turns out to be a newt, with four legs and spots on its back. At that moment a small frog jumps out onto a lily pad. It has the white mark on its nose just like Freddie but this is a frog! What's happened wonders Jess. Horace comes back and explains that frogs start out as tadpoles and gradually change, growing legs and losing their tail.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Horace has planned a big musical show but before it can start it begins raining and everyone runs for shelter. How can we keep dry? Asks JESS - that's the Big Question. Jess, Baa and Billie find shelter under some vine leaves. They're keeping dry but they're too far away from the pond to watch the show. Jess thinks that maybe they could wear a hat to keep dry - Baa's hat is soft and lets the water in though so that's no good but it gives Jess another idea. They can use the big basket in his barn as a giant hat to keep them all dry. It's made of wood and is hard. It's bound to keep them dry. But the woven basket lets the water in too. What are they going to do? Mimi walks by with her umbrella. She's lovely and dry. They all try to crowd under it but it's not big enough. We need to build a BIG umbrella says Jess. And they can use the vine leaves that kept them dry earlier. Perfect. The friends all build a huge umbrella that they can shelter under as they listen to Horace's fantastic music show. They've

Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch's easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag's high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she's often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

Meanwhile,Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep12
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.
